In mid-August-mid-October 2023, the Water Boards cohort instructors and mentors will lead second Openscapes Champions Cohort at the Water Boards!

The 2023 Cohort will include [3 to 6 teams of no more than 6 individuals per team]{.underline}. **Water Boards teams will be able to apply for this opportunity starting in June 2023.**
